Class Treasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • Thing
      • Treasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Lootable

    public class Treasure
extends Thing
implements Lootable
    Lootable object which doesn't fight.

      • Treasure

        public Treasure(java.lang.String shortDescription,
                double value)
        Make a treasure. Note: Character replacement rules from Thing apply
        Parameters:
        shortDescription - short name for this item. (This will also be used as the long description)
        value - worth of this item

      • repr

        public java.lang.String repr()
        Get encoded representation. Note: when representing doubles, use String.format("%.5f", value)
        Specified by:
        repr in class Thing
        Returns:
        $;V;S where V=value, S=raw short description
        (eg "$;14.50000;box")

      • decode

        public static Treasure decode(java.lang.String encoded)
        Factory to create Treasure from a String
        Parameters:
        encoded - repr() form of the object
        Returns:
        decoded Object or null for failure. Failures include: null parameters, empty input or improperly encoded input.
